channel.title: Attack Graphs on Code Before Breach
channel.description: Recent content in Attack Graphs on Code Before Breach

item.title: SPOF in Cybersecurity: From History to Strategy, a Graph-Based Analysis
item.description: Analyzing the threat of Single Points of Failure (SPOF) through historical examples and graph theory, this piece presents a strategic approach to identifying and mitigating structural weaknesses in cybersecurity infrastructures.
